meanings.definition: Greater in size or extent than others.
meanings.sent1: The elephant is larger than the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The blue whale is larger than any other animal on Earth.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so large that it could feed the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was larger than life, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The mountain loomed larger than anything I had ever seen before.

meanings.sent1: She always chooses the larger when shopping for clothes.
meanings.sent2: Comparing sizes, the larger is usually more expensive.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't decide between the larger or the smaller pizza.
meanings.sent4: In the land of giants, even the larger seemed small.
meanings.sent5: The larger of the two boxes held the treasure we were seeking.
